name: n8n Form Trigger
semantic_context: Generate webforms in n8n and pass their responses to the workflow
natural_language_description: 这是 n8n Form Trigger 节点。主要用于: Generate webforms in n8n and pass their responses to the workflow

path.name: path
path.description: The final segment of the form's URL, both for test and production
path.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Path | 作用: The final segment of the form's URL, both for test and production | (必填项)

formTitle.name: formTitle
formTitle.description: Shown at the top of the form
formTitle.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Title | 作用: Shown at the top of the form | (必填项)

formDescription.name: formDescription
formDescription.description: Shown underneath the Form Title. Can be used to prompt the user on how to complete the form. Accepts HTML.
formDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Description | 作用: Shown underneath the Form Title. Can be used to prompt the user on how to complete the form. Accepts HTML.

formFields.name: formFields
formFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Elements | 默认值: {}

responseMode.name: responseMode
responseMode.description: When to respond to the form submission
responseMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Respond When | 作用: When to respond to the form submission | 默认值: onReceived
available_options: Form Is Submitted (值: onReceived) - As soon as this node receives the form submission
Workflow Finishes (值: lastNode) - When the last node of the workflow is executed
Using 'Respond to Webhook' Node (值: responseNode) - When the 'Respond to Webhook' node is executed

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: formSubmittedText (值: None) - The text displayed to users after they filled the form
